snippet: Many companies have retained lobbying firms that employ former aides to Max Baucus, the chairman of the Senate Finance Committee, which will have a crucial role in shaping tax legislation.
abstract: Many companies have retained lobbying firms that employ former aides to Sen Max Baucus, chairman of Senate Finance Committee, which will have crucial role in shaping tax legislation; no other lawmaker on Capitol Hill has such sizable constellation of former aides working as tax lobbyists.
lead_paragraph: Many companies have retained lobbying firms that employ former aides to Max Baucus, the chairman of the Senate Finance Committee, which will have a crucial role in shaping tax legislation.

headline.seo: Tax Lobby Builds Ties to Max Baucus
headline.main: Tax Lobby Builds Ties to Chairman of Finance Panel
headline.print_headline: Tax Lobby Builds Ties to Chairman Of Finance Panel
